version_description:
New in the app:
- support and instructions for Corporate Classic Netbank customers
- activation instructions improved, added a link to nordea.fi page that links to instruction videos and printable instructions
- possibility to copy activation code from SMS
- iPhone 6 and 6 plus optimization
- small iOS 9 fixes and improvements
- support for iOS 9.2 version

- possibility to copy activation code from SMS

- small iOS 9 fixes and improvements
- support for iOS 9.2 version

- Verify Call From Nordea (only for Finland)
- App review dialog
- General bug fixes + enhancements

- New settings menu layout
- Defect fixes

We improved the Codes app for you.
- We added support for dark mode into the Codes app. If you are using your phone in dark mode, Codes will also use a dark theme.
- You can now set Codes manually to offline mode. This is handy as you can keep using your device online but have Codes in offline mode.
- On top of that we fixed bugs and made some technical improvements, to make your experience with Codes better.

We improved the Codes app for you.
- We added support for dark mode into the Codes app. If you are using your phone in dark mode, Codes will also use a dark theme.
- You can now set Codes manually to offline mode. This is handy as you can keep using your device online but have Codes in offline mode.
- On top of that we fixed bugs and made some technical improvements, to make your experience with Codes better.

We have improved usability and stability for your benefit. New icons have been introduced and the layout and text for the different screens in the activation process have been updated. Enjoy!

For Finnish personal customers we are also introducing new methods to order codes for the activation process. More info in Nordea.fi/codeapp.

We have improved usability and stability for your benefit. New icons have been introduced and the layout and text for the different screens in the activation process have been updated. Enjoy!

For Finnish personal customers we are also introducing new methods to order codes for the activation process. More info in Nordea.fi/codeapp.
Minor improvements and bug fixes
Minor improvements and bug fixes

Finnish Nordea Business customers can now activate Nordea Codes app to a new device easily with QR code.

- Minor improvements and bug fixes
- New way to activate Nordea Codes for Finnish Nordea Business customers

Read more: https://www.nordea.fi/business-codes-app

Finnish Nordea Business customers can now activate Nordea Codes app to a new device easily with QR code.

- Minor improvements and bug fixes
- New way to activate Nordea Codes for Finnish Nordea Business customers

Read more: https://www.nordea.fi/business-codes-app
